alleyhunter.desc: Number of stacks to gain at the beginning. Default 0, maximum 10.

moonpiercer.desc: Number of frames until the Leaf is picked up by the active character after every proc.

sacrificialjade.desc: 1 to enable the passive in the beginning, 0 default.

sapwoodblade.desc: Number of frames until the Leaf is picked up by the active character after every proc.

serpentspine.desc: Number of stacks to gain at the beginning. Default 0, maximum 5.
